entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
